instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: Enforce DARK MODE globally. Do not implement a light mode toggle.
Use the 'Unbounded' font for all headings to give a distinct tech feel. Import it from Google Fonts.
Implement the 'Yellow -> Green' gradient on primary buttons and key accents.
Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the dashboard overview.
Ensure the Hero section uses the video background (hero-bg.mp4) with a dark overlay for text readability.
Do not use generic 'Inter' for headings.
For the 'Course Catalog', use a card-based layout with hover effects that reveal more info.
The 'AI Tutor' chat interface should look like a modern messaging app (e.g., ChatGPT/Discord) but with the brand's dark/neon aesthetic.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' aesthetics (generic centered layouts, standard Bootstrap look).
Use generous spacing (p-8, p-12) to create a premium feel.
Micro-interactions are mandatory (hover states, focus rings, active states).
Never use transparent backgrounds for dropdowns or overlays; use glassmorphism or solid dark colors.
Ensure accessibility: Text contrast must be high (White on Black, Black on Neon Green).
